property.name: 能力
property.value: 『瑟曦·兰尼斯特』在{阴谋}争夺中被宣告为进攻者时不横置。 响应：在1张或更多卡牌从一位对手的手牌中被弃除后，如果你不支援该玩家，『瑟曦·兰尼斯特』获得1枚权力标记。（每回合限制三次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Cersei Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in an [int] challenge. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand, if you do not support that player, Cersei Lannister gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你赢得一次争夺后，将一名原住民进攻角色返回你的手牌，以（选择一项）：补2张牌、获得3枚金币、或将你展示中的战略牌效能值提升1直到本次争夺结束。（每阶段限制两次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge, return an attacking Clansman character to your hand to (choose one): draw 2 cards, gain 3 gold, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你备战『凯冯·兰尼斯特爵士』后，从你的弃牌堆中选择一个{兰尼斯特}或中立的地区或附属，并将其放置进场。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Ser Kevan Lannister, choose a [Lannister] or neutral location or attachment in your discard pile and put it into play.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你赢得一次『提魅之子提魅』进攻的争夺后，选择并杀死一名印刷费用不高于X的角色。X等于你控制的原住民角色数。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Timett Son of Timett is attacking, choose and kill a character with printed cost X or lower. X is the number of Clansman characters you control.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 你控制的每名骑士角色在独自进攻时获得名望。 争夺行动：选择一名御林铁卫角色。直到本阶段结束，该角色获得一个{阴谋}符号。（每阶段限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Knight character you control gains renown while attacking alone. Challenges Action: Choose a Kingsguard character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [int] icon. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当1张且仅1张牌从一位对手的牌组中被弃除时，查看该玩家牌组顶的2张牌并从中弃除1张以代替。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When exactly 1 card is discarded from a player's deck, instead look at the top 2 cards of that player's deck and discard 1.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 『齐克之女齐拉』上每有一枚人耳标记，她获得能力值+1。当她有3枚或更多人耳标记时，她获得威吓和名望。 响应：在一名角色于『齐克之女齐拉』进攻的争夺中被杀后，在『齐克之女齐拉』上放置一枚人耳标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: Chella Daughter of Cheyk gets +1 STR for each ear token she has. While she has 3 or more ear tokens, she gains intimidate and renown. Reaction: After a character is killed during a challenge in which Chella Daughter of Cheyk is attacking, place an ear token on her.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『格雷果爵士的劫掠者』使用劫掠弃除一张事件后，将其重置。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Ser Gregor's Marauders discards an event using pillage, stand Ser Gregor's Marauders.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当『多夫之子夏嘎』在你的手牌中时，如果你控制原住民角色或『提利昂·兰尼斯特』，『多夫之子夏嘎』获得伏击(0)。 强制响应：在『多夫之子夏嘎』使用伏击进场后，选择并杀死你控制的一名{兰尼斯特}角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: While Shagga Son of Dolf is in your hand, he gains ambush (0) if you control a Clansman character or Tyrion Lannister. Forced Reaction: After Shagga Son of Dolf enters play using ambush, choose and kill a [Lannister] character you control.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你打出一张事件后，从你的手牌中选择并弃除1张牌，以补1张牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you play an event, choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：在一次有你控制的原住民进攻角色参与的争夺中，横置你的阵营牌，以将『月人部』从你的手牌中放置进场（未横置状态），并作为进攻者参与到争夺中。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, kneel your faction card to put Moon Brothers into play from your hand (standing), participating as an attacker.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『红堡密探』使用伏击进场后，选择一名印刷费用不高于3的角色。如果你的手牌数多于该角色的控制者，将该角色返回其拥有者的手牌

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Red Keep Spy enters play using ambush, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower. If you have more cards in hand than that character's controller, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你赢得一次『爱拉雅雅』参与的争夺后，从失败对手的金库中转移1枚金币到你的金库中。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Alayaya is participating, move 1 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to your own.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当你控制1名且仅1名其他{兰尼斯特}贵族或贵妇角色时，『蓝赛尔·兰尼斯特爵士』获得能力值+X。X等于那名角色的能力值。

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control exactly 1 other [Lannister] Lord or Lady character, Ser Lancel Lannister gets +X STR, where X is that character's STR.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 所有没有手牌的玩家不能通过争夺奖励（完胜和敌对）获得权力标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player with no cards in his or her hand cannot gain power from challenge bonuses (unopposed and rivals).

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你备战『兰尼斯港护卫』后，每位玩家补1张牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Lannisport Guard, each player draws 1 card.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：横置『金牙城』，以获得1枚金币。（如果一位对手没有手牌，则获得3枚金币以代替。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Golden Tooth to gain 1 gold. (3 gold instead if an opponent has no cards in his or her hand.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在一名原住民角色进场后，该角色获得一个由你选择的争夺符号直到本阶段结束。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在赋税阶段开始后，将1枚金币从你的金库中放置到『兰尼斯港藏宝库』上。 备战行动：横置『兰尼斯港藏宝库』，以从其上转移任意枚金币到你的金库中。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the taxation phase begins, place 1 gold from your gold pool on Lannisport Treasury. Marshaling Action: Kneel Lannisport Treasury to move any number of gold from Lannisport Treasury to your gold pool.

property.name: 能力
property.value: {兰尼斯特}贵族或贵妇角色专用。 当你除所附属角色外没有控制其他印刷费用不低于4的贵族或贵妇角色时，所附属角色获得能力值+2并获得名望。

property.name: Text
property.value: [Lannister] Lord or Lady character only. While you control no Lord or Lady characters with printed cost 4 other than attached character, attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 在{阴谋}争夺中，所附属角色获得能力值+2并获得隐秘。

property.name: Text
property.value: During [int] challenges, attached character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.

card.name: A Lannister Always Pays His Debts

property.name: 能力
property.value: 争夺行动：选择一位本阶段中与你发生过争夺且获胜的对手。本阶段中你可以向该玩家额外发起一次{军事}争夺和一次{阴谋}争夺。（每阶段至多1次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent who has won a challenge against you this phase. You may initiate an additional [mil] and [int] challenge against that player this phase. (Max 1 per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你以5点或更高总能力差值赢得的一次{阴谋}争夺效能执行后，补2张牌。（如果失败的对手没有手牌，则补4张牌以代替。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [int] challenge you won by 5 or more STR, draw 2 cards. (4 cards instead if the losing opponent has no cards in his or her hand.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 仅当你控制骑士角色时打出。 C争夺行动：将你控制的一名角色返回其拥有者的手牌。然后，使你控制的一名骑士角色获得1枚权力标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a Knight character. Challenges Action: Return a character you control to its owner's hand. Then, have a Knight character you control gain 1 power.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在统御阶段开始后，选择一名角色。本阶段中该角色的能力值不计入其控制者的统御总值中

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, choose a character. That character does not contribute its STR to its controller's total for dominance this phase.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 私生子、贵族或贵妇角色专用。 当你阵营牌上的权力标记多于所有对手时，所附属角色获得能力值+2并获得名望。

property.name: Text
property.value: Bastard, Lord, or Lady character only. While you have more power on your faction card than each opponent, attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当『维克塔利昂·葛雷乔伊』将要被杀时，从其上弃除2枚权力标记，以将其援救。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When Victarion Greyjoy would be killed, discard 2 power from him to save him.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你发起一次{权力}争夺后，横置『老威克岛』，以将你死亡牌堆最顶端的淹神角色横置放置进场，并作为进攻者参与到争夺中。如果你以5点或更高总能力差值赢得本次争夺，将该角色返回你的手牌。否则，将其放置到你的牌组底。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you initiate a [pow] challenge, kneel Old Wyk to put the top Drowned God character in your dead pile into play knelt, participating as an attacker. If you win the challenge by 5 or more STR, return that character to your hand. Otherwise, place it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你输掉一次『崔斯丹·马泰尔』参与的争夺后，选择一名能力值低于他的角色。直到本阶段结束，该角色不能被宣告为防御者。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Trystane Martell is participating, choose a character with lower STR than his. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as a defender.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 争夺行动：选择你控制的一名{马泰尔}角色。直到本阶段结束，该角色的能力值翻倍。在本阶段结束时，如果该角色仍在场上，将其杀死。

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Choose a [Martell] character you control. Until the end of the phase, double that character's STR. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当『“美女”唐纳·希山』防御时，所有进攻角色失去所有关键词。

property.name: Text
property.value: While Sweet Donnel Hill is defending, each attacking character loses all keywords.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当争夺阶段结束时，选择一位本阶段中没有向你发起过{军事}争夺的对手。该玩家从他/她的手牌中随机弃除1张牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent who did not initiate a military challenge against you this phase. That player discards one card at random from his or her hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：横置『简妮·维斯特林』，以选择并重置一名{史塔克}国王或贵族角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Jeyne Westerling to choose and stand a [Stark] King or Lord character.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 强制响应：在一名角色于争夺阶段中进场后，横置该角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, kneel that character.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你赢得一次『巴利斯坦·赛尔弥爵士』参与的争夺后，如果你的手牌数比失败的对手少，将其重置。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Barristan Selmy is participating, if you have fewer cards in hand than the losing opponent, stand him.

property.name: 能力
property.value: {坦格利安}角色专用。 当所附属角色参与争夺时，每名参与争夺的其他角色获得能力值-1。

property.name: Text
property.value: [Targaryen] character only. While attached character is participating in a challenge, each other participating character gets -1 STR.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『艾勒莉·提利尔』进场后，从你牌组顶的10张牌中搜寻一名印刷费用不高于3的{提利尔}角色，将其展示，并加入你的手牌。将你的牌组洗牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Alerie Tyrell enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [Tyrell] character with printed cost 3 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 争夺行动：查看你牌组顶的3张牌。将其中1张加入你的手牌，并将其余按任意顺序放置到你的牌组底。

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当一位对手选择你控制的一名角色作为一个触发类能力的唯一目标时，选择你控制的一名合理的七神角色来作为该触发类能力的目标以代替。（每阶段限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When an opponent chooses a character you control as the only target of a triggered ability, choose an eligible The Seven character you control to become the target of that triggered ability instead. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 在争夺阶段中，所有玩家不能获得金币。

property.name: Text
property.value: During the challenges phase, each player cannot gain gold.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当『野人强盗』进攻一位金库中的金币多于你的对手时，其获得能力值+2。

property.name: Text
property.value: While Wildling Bandit is attacking an opponent with more gold in his or her gold pool than you, it gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Ocean Road to reduce the cost of the next neutral or out-of-faction card you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 独有角色专用。 所附属角色获得一个{阴谋}符号和御前议会属性。

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique character only. Attached character gains an [int] icon and the Small Council trait.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在一位玩家以5点或更高总能力差值赢得一次{阴谋}争夺后，重置所有御前议会角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a player wins an [int] challenge by 5 or more STR, stand each Small Council character.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 你的战略牌组必须包含12张牌，包括5张且仅5张不同的诡计卡牌。在战略阶段中，诡计卡牌不视为在你的战略牌组中。 响应：在你以5点或更高总能力差值赢得一次{阴谋}争夺后，横置你的阵营牌，以展示一张诡计战略。如果该诡计卡牌离场，将其移出游戏。

property.name: Text
property.value: Your plot deck must be 12 cards, including exactly 5 different Scheme cards. During the plot phase, Scheme cards are not considered to be in your plot deck. Reaction: After you win an challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to reveal a Scheme plot. If that card leaves play, remove it from the game.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在争夺阶段开始后，获得3枚金币。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, gain 3 gold.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 强制响应：在争夺阶段开始后，每位玩家选择一名没有附属和权力标记的角色。将所有被选择的角色返回其拥有者的手牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player chooses a character without attachments or power. Return each of those characters to its owner's hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 强制打断：当补牌阶段结束时，每位玩家从其手牌中选择一张牌（如可能）。然后，展示被选择的卡牌。每位展示了最低印刷费用角色的玩家可以将该角色放置进场。

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Interrupt: When the draw phase ends, each player chooses a card in his or her hand, if able. Then, reveal the chosen cards. Each player who revealed a character with the lowest printed cost may put that character into play.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 你打出每张事件的费用减2。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of each event you play by 2.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 在争夺阶段你发起的首次{阴谋}争夺中，你控制的所有角色在被宣告为进攻者时不横置。

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [int] challenge you initiate during the challenges phase.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 每位玩家补牌阶段的补牌数量增加1。

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 每位玩家补牌阶段的补牌数量减1。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.
